Message.Title: AT&T Chart - What is it telling us now?
Message.Msg: Are there any chart watchers in the forum? I'm wondering what the chart pattern suggests to those with a charting or technical analysis background. Long AT&T, Short $38 August Calls

If the voters of this country would pay attention to the budgets, spending, favoritism, and stupidity shown by the members of Congress, they would vote all of them out. If voters considered for a few moments the ridiculous statements that are later called, ‘misstatements’ or taken out of context comments attributed to some of these crooks, they might get a real picture of the people they are voting for. The media and money determine our elected officials, not the American people. The American people aren't that smart. They make decisions based religion, race, how much the government is or isn't doing for them or members of their family. They listen to thirty-second sound bites, the opinions offered on Sunday morning left leaning political talk shows, conservative talk radio or what their neighbors tell them. Few if any really understand the impacts of the platforms of either Party will have on the country. Some vote a straight ticket because 'they always have' or their father always voted with one Party or another. The biggest influence on politicians in this country is not the desire to provide a public service, but the power and money that comes with the position and how it will impact their ability to remain in the light of that power and money for as long as possible. We pretty much get what we deserve.

Message.Title: SSA orders ammo why?
Message.Msg: What is up with this? Why is Obama arming SSA and other service agencies? First the Department of Homeland Security ordered 450 million rounds of ammunition, then the National Oceanic Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) submitted an order for 46,000 rounds of high powered ammo, and now Business Insider reports that the Social Security Administration is asking to purchase 174,000 rounds of .357 Sig 125 grain bonded jacketed hollow point bullets.
